mapper.select: SELECT u.userName,r.title as title,a.`name` as addressName,i.imgName as imgName,i.imgDir as imgDir FROM user_like ul, `user` u, image i ,address a ,resource r WHERE ul.user_id=u.id and u.addressId=a.id and ul.resource_id=r.id and r.imageId=i.id and ul.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from user_like where user_id=#{userId} and resource_id=#{resourceId}
